ordinal¶

Stoner.tools.ordinal(value: int) → str[source]¶

Format an integer into an ordinal string.

Parameters:

value (int) – Number to be written as an ordinal string

Returns:

(str) – Ordinal String such as ‘1st’,’2nd’ etc.
